title: Vaara Emerald Diamond Bangle - Elegance Redefined
materials: High-Quality Cubic Zirconia. Features the signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: Intricate filigree design interspersed with sparkling cubic zirconia, culminating in a central oval-cut Emerald. The bangle showcases a floral motif, blending modern aesthetics with traditional South Indian karigari. The openwork design allows for comfortable wear and a striking visual appeal. Hinged closure for ease of wear.
occasions: or as a statement piece for sophisticated evening wear. Suitable for both traditional South Indian attire and contemporary outfits.
description: This Vaara bangle showcases a perfect blend of modern design and traditional craftsmanship. The high-quality cubic zirconia ensures a dazzling sparkle, while the natural emerald adds a touch of timeless elegance. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees long-lasting shine, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. Lightweight and comfortable for all-day wear.
